newsitem.title: USA: Consolidated Stores sets stock split.
newsitem.headline: Consolidated Stores sets stock split.

text.p: Consolidated Stores Corp said Tuesday its board has authorized a 5-for-4 split of the company's common shares, to be effected by a distribution of additional shares on June 24 to stockholders of record on June 10.
Consolidated Stores, a retailer specializing in toys and closeout merchandise, operates 1,840 stores in all 50 states and Puerto Rico.
Stores by division consist of 1,203 toy and closeout toy stores operating as K*B Toys, K*B Toy Works and K*B Toy Outlet and 637 closeout stores operating as Big Lots and Odd Lots.
